definitions.definition: The act of one who chases another; a pursuit .
A hunt ; the act of hunting; the pursuit of game.
( uncountable ) A children's game where one player chases another.
( British ) A large country estate where game may be shot or hunted .
Anything being chased, especially a vessel in time of war.
( obsolete ) A wild animal that is hunted .
( nautical ) Any of the guns that fire directly ahead or astern; either a bow chase or stern chase .

( real tennis ) The occurrence of a second bounce by the ball in certain areas of the court , giving the server the chance, later in the game, to "play off" the chase from the receiving end and possibly win the point .

( real tennis ) A division of the floor of a gallery, marked by a figure or otherwise; the spot where a ball falls, and between which and the dedans the adversary must drive the ball in order to gain a point.
( cycling ) One or more riders who are ahead of the peloton and trying to join the race or stage leaders .
( music ) A series of brief improvised jazz solos by a number of musicians taking turns.

main_definition: The act of one who chases another; a pursuit .
secondary_definitions: A hunt ; the act of hunting; the pursuit of game.
( uncountable ) A children's game where one player chases another.
( British ) A large country estate where game may be shot or hunted .
Anything being chased, especially a vessel in time of war.
( obsolete ) A wild animal that is hunted .
( nautical ) Any of the guns that fire directly ahead or astern; either a bow chase or stern chase .

( real tennis ) The occurrence of a second bounce by the ball in certain areas of the court , giving the server the chance, later in the game, to "play off" the chase from the receiving end and possibly win the point .

( real tennis ) A division of the floor of a gallery, marked by a figure or otherwise; the spot where a ball falls, and between which and the dedans the adversary must drive the ball in order to gain a point.
( cycling ) One or more riders who are ahead of the peloton and trying to join the race or stage leaders .
( music ) A series of brief improvised jazz solos by a number of musicians taking turns.

definitions.definition: ( printing ) A rectangular steel or iron frame into which pages or columns of type are locked for printing or plate -making.

main_definition: ( printing ) A rectangular steel or iron frame into which pages or columns of type are locked for printing or plate -making.

definitions.definition: A groove cut in an object; a slot: the chase for the quarrel on a crossbow .

A trench or channel or other encasement structure for encasing ( archaically spelled enchasing ) drainpipes or wiring; a hollow space in the wall of a building encasing ventilation ducts, chimney flues, wires, cables or plumbing.
The part of a gun in front of the trunnions .
A kind of joint by which an overlap joint is changed to a flush joint by means of a gradually deepening rabbet , as at the ends of clinker-built boats.

main_definition: A groove cut in an object; a slot: the chase for the quarrel on a crossbow .
secondary_definitions: ( architecture ) A trench or channel or other encasement structure for encasing ( archaically spelled enchasing ) drainpipes or wiring; a hollow space in the wall of a building encasing ventilation ducts, chimney flues, wires, cables or plumbing.
The part of a gun in front of the trunnions .
( shipbuilding ) A kind of joint by which an overlap joint is changed to a flush joint by means of a gradually deepening rabbet , as at the ends of clinker-built boats.
